snippet: The police veteran, who was convicted of planting drugs on two people, said he could no longer look at himself in the mirror and begged the judge for leniency.
abstract: Former New York City Police detective Jason Arbeeny, who was convicted of planting drugs on two people, is sentenced to probation.
lead_paragraph: The police veteran, who was convicted of planting drugs on two people, said he could no longer look at himself in the mirror and begged the judge for leniency.

headline.seo: Probation for Ex-Detective in Drug-Planting Case
headline.main: Ex-Detective Avoids Jail in Drug-Planting Case
headline.print_headline: Ex-Detective Avoids Jail in Drug Case
